Operation: Which offset (or morphology) operation to apply
bVoxWrap: Apply a "VoxWrap" operation to input mesh(es) before computing the morphology.  Fixes results for inputs with holes and/or self-intersections.
bRemoveInternalsAfterVoxWrap: Remove internal surfaces from the VoxWrap output, before computing the morphology.
ThickenShells: Thicken open-boundary surfaces (extrude them inwards) before VoxWrapping them. Units are in world space. If 0, no extrusion is applied.
